message: How likely are you to drop the extra $10 to view the games ad-free?
To be honest i hardly even notice them.  I might think about it if they were more intrusive (and because I don't mind supporting such a fantastic league), but as is there really isn't much incentive.
I've bought three seasons the $10 package, then I decided to spend an extra $10 on top of that for no ads this season.
Sounds like it was the wrong time to do that, b/c they apparently made the ads better / less intrusive this season.
Regardless, $10 is basically $0 for me (I live like a college student), and it's nice to be able to go back and watch games without having to sit through an ad first.
I'd say you made a good choice.  So far they've been more annoying for me than usual
